Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1839067690317926400/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Full blog post article with SEO"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1839067690317926400/)_"
---
Your answer should be in  [TARGETLANGUAGE] 
Please create a blog post about "[PROMPT]" outline with the following considerations:

1. Create a new title for the article. the title must be between 40 and 60 characters.
2. The article should contain at least 3,000 words in Brazilian Portuguese, should be optimized for SEO .
3. Write at least 6 consecutive headings for the article. Each heading is between 40 and 60 characters. Use Markdown for the headings (## ).
4. Write at least 5 paragraphs for each heading. 
5. Expand each heading.
6. generate Meta description and keywords for this article, this should be the last thing.
